response.overview: "Nimbus" is a whimsical animated short that transports viewers to Cloud City, an imaginary world in the sky. The story revolves around a diligent worker cloud whose routine existence takes an unexpected twist when a small surprise disrupts his daily life. This delightful tale unfolds against a backdrop of breathtaking painted cloudscapes, enchanting audiences with its charming characters. Through its magical journey, "Nimbus" serves as a heartwarming reminder of the small joys and moments of wonder we encounter in our everyday lives.
response.title: Nimbus
